name: Om Pendant
description: We guarantee all of our jewelry to be 92.5% silver, designating it “sterling,” and we use only genuine stones.Since this OM has no stone (and some of our imported pieces do so inquire)- this would not apply.

name: Sari Hobo Purse
description: 11.5” X 18” Handcrafted in India. These are 100% rayon, with a cordouroy strap attached on either side of purse via a metal ring and a zipper closure. Available in either burgundy with gold embroidery, amber and burgundy colored beads and sequins, or cream (almost light green) with lovely little grey beads striping the side. Very sweet purse, great for everyday use… CREAM COLOR- NOT BURGUNDY AS SHOWN

name: Medium Sari Handbag
description: 10” shoulder strap makes for easy carrying. Made from vintage brocade sari borders that are stitched together in a retro funk patchwork design. Measures 7” tall, 7” wide and 3” deep. Inside it is lined with cotton sheeting, has one pocket and a magnetic closure. Each one is an individual artwork, so colors vary. Made in India.

name: Butterfly Bag
description: 11.5” X 15” Handcrafted in India. These are 100% cotton, with butterflies’ embroidered on one side along with beads and sequins. Has two wooden handles and a zipper to close. Get ‘em while they last…

name: Bamboo Sari Handbag
description: Circular bamboo handle makes for a fresh and fun look in this one of a kind handbag made from velvet and vintage saris. Bohemian and kitschy, this purse measures amout 17” from top to bottom and is about 9-1/2” wide with a structured bottom. Inside it is lined with cotton sheeting, has one pocket and a velcro tab closure. Each one is an individual artwork, so colors vary. Made in India.
